doc.name: HSMMGeneratorGaussianEmissions
doc.description:
This actor implements the Expectation-Maximization(EM) algorithm for parameter estimation in a family of graphical stochastic models, known as the Hidden Semi-Markov Model family.

In addition to estimating the parameters of a hidden markov model,

References

[1] Dewar, M.; Wiggins, C.; Wood, F., Inference in Hidden Markov Models with Explicit State Duration Distributions, Signal Processing Letters, IEEE , vol.19, no.4, pp.235,238, April 2012
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
